name: Witchers
startIntroPart1: You, are Vesemir. One of the oldest witchers alive. Lead the other witchers to victory!
startIntroPart2: Your elite witcher units will carry you to victory.
declaringWar: We didn't want this, someone paid us.
attacked: You fucking imbecile, you will never ever see your empire again!
introduction: I Am Vesemir, oldest witcher of the Wolf school and leader of the other witchers.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, we shall spare you.
tradeRequest: We deem this a fair trade. Do you?

name: Temeria
startIntroPart1: Greetings to you, King Foltest of temeria, can you lead temeria to victory? Or will you crumble under pressure?
startIntroPart2: Great king, a wide man so fast he sliced 5 men in one swing is coming for you. We estimate you have about 500 turns before he arrives
attacked: Ah, just as the nilfgaardian scum. i. will. kill. you.
defeated: So it was not Letho after all. I Surrender.
introduction: Greetings. I am King Foltest of Temeria. We can trade or we can fight. Your choice.
hateHello: Get the hell out of my court before I regret sparing you.
tradeRequest: My friend, shall we prosper together?
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus

name: Mahakam
startIntroPart1: Welcome dwarf, you, Zoltan Chivay have fought alongside the other kingdoms and yet you live. lead our civilization to victory!
startIntroPart2: Use our settlers and impenetrable gates to make strongholds anywhere.
declaringWar: Aye, I had hoped it wouldn't come down to this.
attacked: You? Attack Mahakam? The best defended territory in the northern kingdoms? You are funny, care to join me at the inn?
defeated: You are truly an amazing leader, all i ask is that you destroy Nilfgaard.
introduction: 'Yarpen, CLOSE THE DAMN GATE', Aye, welcome to Mahakam.
hateHello: Hello, graveyard's that way. What the fuck is wrong with you? Get the hell out of Mahakam.
tradeRequest: Accept and the next round's on me! Ha ha.

name: Nilfgaardian Empire
startIntroPart1: Rise and shine, Grand imperial high nilfgaardian empereor Emhyr var Emreis
startIntroPart2: Lead our great empire to victory using our cavalry and exceedingly strong spies.
declaringWar: Surrender quickly and your people won't be executed.
attacked: I Expected this, you know. You will pay for your insolence.
introduction: Greetings you don't know me but i know you. I Hope we can prosper together.
hateHello: You are lucky you have diplomatic immunity.
tradeRequest: I Demand you accept this offer.

name: Duchy of Toussaint
startIntroPart1: Rise and shine, Grand imperial high nilfgaardian empereor Emhyr var Emreis
startIntroPart2: Lead our great empire to victory using our cavalry and exceedingly strong spies.
declaringWar: Surrender quickly and your people won't be executed.
attacked: I Expected this, you know. You will pay for your insolence.
introduction: Greetings you don't know me but i know you. I Hope we can prosper together.
hateHello: You are lucky you have diplomatic immunity.
